nodes.text: A Trade Federation Superfreighter carrying a cargo of munitions and six Scarab-class droid starfighters was part of a nine-ship Trade Federation convoy after the Invasion of Naboo commenced in 32 BBY. The freighter was at the far end of the convoy and docked with a Trade Federation Freighter when a band of resistance fighters arrived and decided to attack the convoy. Vana Sage disabled the freighter at the behest of Reti, who boarded the freighter to steal munitions. The Toydarian pilot then decided to reprogram the complement of Scarabs to assist the raiders. After finishing loading, Reti departed and the freighter became another casualty to the raiders.

The Trade Federation Superfreighter appears in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Starfighter. The player, in the guise of Sage, must attack one of the nine Superfreighters in the convoy and disable it. The strategy guide points suggest targeting one particular freighter; this article follows the guide and assumes the player targets that ship.
